title: Since the Avatars don't work
content:
PDF attachments still work. So humorous images can still be posted.

 [‹ FF Meta Pro st ligature](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810001140/http:/typophile.com/node/16659 "Go to previous forum topic") [single storey g but double decker a ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810001140/http:/typophile.com/node/16494 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Dan Weaver

comments.content:
Yo Dan, They’re B-A-A-H-K!

ChrisL
Finally, I’ve been waiting to launch my new Avatar.

The Eyes have it Norbert :-)  
AIGA would have a fit if they knew you did work on spec :-)

ChrisL

Maybe the avatars werte too tired to show up because, like Norbert, they caught the Red Eye last night :-)

ChrisL

Hey Chris,  
quit making fun of my Type ID Specs!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810001140im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ID_ad.gif)
I do appreciate the fact that you’ve dotted your eyes.

Norbert is just making a spectacle of himself :-)

ChrisL
It seems the Riddler has struck again. Everything is marked by ? .

I think Norbert’s new avatar broke it :-)

ChrisL
I love the new Norbert, but Cris always rules

There are no rules in mine, just glyphs :-)

ChrisL

Back to my ol’ self.  
My new avatar was starting to creep me out.  
(Plus the ladies run away from me when I wear them).

“(Plus the ladies run away from me when I wear them)”

So how is that different than usual? :-)

ChrisL
They usually just politely back away before running. :-(

The women who see me are usually just blinded by the glare off the top of my head and turn their heads before being turned into pillars of salt :-)

ChrisL

At least you can use salt.  
They just leave me in the dust.

I see Dan also got bored and changed his avatar.  
Very cool Dan.

I’m thinking of changing mine again to something more like this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810001140im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dez-icon.gif)
That would leave Chris out of sorts.
pillars of stylistic alternates? what? \>^P

Since Norbert is trying to make me see red, I thought I would sort it out this way:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810001140im_/http:/typophile.com/files/norbert%20Nyet.jpg)

ChrisL

Hah...  
a little Visine will take the RED out!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810001140im_/http:/typophile.com/files/visine1.jpg)
The avatar that freaks me out is Nick Shinns. It reminds me of a bad B movie mad scientist looking at the people he just shrunk.

“a little Visine will take the RED out!”

You should have given that to Joe McCarthy in the 50s :-)

ChrisL
Ironically, the Red scare is now the Republicans winning more states.
I especially love Secrearty of State Rice going to the european capitals and telling them the United States doesn’t condone torture and the torture that wasn’t torture will not happen again.

It is torture just listening to their crock of Bovine feces.

ChrisL
